ygData.msgSnippet: Hell Beast looked to his wrist. A bright red beakon signaled that he was reciving a message, and from all bots it had to be from Unicron. The Energonians

--part1_22.147455bf.2801d938_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Hell Beast looked to his wrist. A bright red beakon signaled that he 
was reciving a message, and from all bots it had to be from Unicron. The 
Energonians noticed it instantly; Ominous cocked his eye.
       "Are you going to answer that, friend?" Ominous said, lowering his 
weapon. The news that he was willing to join with Hell Beast was still 
shocking to both the Predacons and the Energonians.
       Hell Beast promptly took the message, and glanced over at Aracnia. 
Putting his wrist back down he faced Ominous. "We are requested at the 
Cybertronian Fire. Its under a massive invasion and obliteration." He drew a 
smile. "I guess this would be a perfect chance for you to display just how 
much youre willing to join us."
       The Energonians began to mutter something, quietly. Ominous shushed 
them and played with the offer. The Predacons and Energonain forces together 
would be strong...and enough to do plenty of damage.
       "Alright. My Energonains shall meet you there in an hour." He said, 
and a blue light from behinde him ignited and Ominous along with the other 
Energonians lifted from the ground. With one last look Ominous turned and 
sailed off for his base to prepare.
       "Smooth one. We better hurry before Unicron eats both of us." Aracnia 
said, already quickly departing with Hell Beast in pursuit.

       Tarantulas was not an idiot. He picked up a copy of Unicrons message 
because most of the stream data had to pass through the Rampra to get to bots 
persoanl communicators. He had been listening into the battle like it were a 
radio program.
       "Unicron wants us to descimate the Cybertronian Fire...and the 
Maximals. Once and for all, lets do this!" He said in his hazey voice. The 
others quickly got to arms and departed.

       Tarantulas, Gremlin, Pheniox, Jackle, Klash, Craken, Inferno, Rampage, 
Nighteyes, Paddletail, Aerostreak, Quickstrike, Adrax, Aquarious, Tankkor, 
Waspinator, Marine, and Bezerker marched towrds the Cybertronian Fire.


       Mortem was still inside Allience Island with her robotical companion 
Tal-X. By now Zardus had left to deal with other matters, but she had gotten 
the information she needed. It was time to depart. Unfortunetly she was going 
to have to go over the battle at the Cybertronian Fire. She couldnt get 
envolved with this war....there was no way she could.

--part1_22.147455bf.2801d938_boundary
